snippet.title: Civitatem : Pre-Alpha Teaser
snippet.description:
Civitatem is an upcoming medieval city builder, where you help your villagers raise a new settlement in dangerous lands, by making use of their skills and available world resources.  PRE-ORDER NOW and NAME a Villager!  http://lw-games.com

Follow and Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/670820/Civitatem/
Minds: https://www.minds.com/LWGames
IndieDb: http://www.indiedb.com/games/civitatem

Music by: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
